Authorities are investigating the footage and searching for the rooftop shooter after Kirk was pronounced dead minutes later.

title: Scientists detect ‘geological heartbeat’ that can split Africa and create a new ocean
description: Beneath eastern Africa, scientists have discovered a dramatic geological process driven by rhythmic pulses of molten rock rising from the Earth's mantle. This "geological heartbeat" weakens the crust, causing earthquakes and volcanic activity. Over millions of years, this process is expected to split Africa into two parts, creating a new ocean basin and reshaping the continent.

Parents shield kids, students scatter — Video shows chaos as Charlie Kirk shot on stage
description: During a "Prove Me Wrong" event at Utah University, right-wing activist Charlie Kirk was shot, causing widespread panic. The incident occurred while Kirk addressed a question about transgender mass shooting suspects, turning a campus debate into a scene of terror. Witnesses described the chaos as attendees scrambled for safety, highlighting concerns about security at the event.

title: 200 flyers left sweating on Singapore-bound Air India flight; stranded inside for 2hrs
description: Over 200 passengers on an Air India flight to Singapore faced a distressing ordeal at Delhi airport. Due to malfunctioning air conditioning and electrical systems on Wednesday night, passengers were stuck inside the Boeing 787-9 Dreamliner for nearly two hours. The discomfort led to passengers using newspapers as fans before being deplaned.

title: Cash, beaker set, motherboard seized: ISIS-inspired module busted; suspects were planning 'IED attacks'
description: Delhi Police have reportedly dismantled an 'IS-inspired' module, arresting suspects across Delhi, Ranchi, and Mumbai. The suspects were allegedly planning IED attacks to establish an Islamic Caliphate. Authorities seized bomb-making materials, including chemicals and electronic components. Investigations suggest an ISI operative posed as an IS recruiter, guiding the suspects through encrypted apps.

title: Tariff row: PM Modi's replies signal firm red lines; hopes high for deal with Trump
Woman tied up, stabbed to death by 2 domestic helps in Hyderabad flat
description: In Kukatpally, Hyderabad, a shocking incident occurred where a 50-year-old woman was murdered in her apartment by two domestic helpers. The perpetrators, after tying up and stabbing Renu Agarwal, stole gold jewelry and cash. They fled the scene on a two-wheeler, prompting a police manhunt to apprehend them, with suspicion pointing towards Ranchi as a possible escape destination.

title: Solar eclipse 2025: When is Surya Grahan in September and will it be visible in India?
description: September 2025 features a rare celestial double feature: a dramatic lunar eclipse on the 7th and a partial solar eclipse on the 21st. The solar eclipse, dubbed the "equinox eclipse," will be visible at sunrise in the Southern Hemisphere, particularly in New Zealand, eastern Australia, and parts of the South Pacific.
